s.text: The cover story , rehashing last week's discovery that smart mice can be genetically engineered, predicts that the bioengineering of human intelligence will soon be possible.
The comedian is making his mark with middlebrow movies, smart standup specials, and his own eclectic HBO show.

Neuroscience suggests that by the third month infants are mature enough to reason and process language.

An article introduces the father of compassionate conservatism, Jewish-Communist-turned-evangelical-Christian Marvin Olasky, who penned a book arguing that faith-based charities could supplant the welfare state.
